record.field: select fecha_emision AS "FECHA EMISIÓN", fecha_operacion AS "FECHA OPERACIÓN", fecha_registro AS "FECHA REGISTRO", tipo_factura AS "TIPO FACTURA", n_documento AS "Nº DOCUMENTO", cuenta AS "CUENTA", nif AS "NIF", nombre AS "NOMBRE", provincia AS "PROVINCIA", pais AS "PAIS", name AS "DESCRIPCIÓN", grupo AS "GRUPO CONTABLE", forma_pago AS "FORMA DE PAGO", terminos_pago AS "TÉRMINOS DE PAGO", omitir_fuera_plazo AS "OMITIR FUERA DE PLAZO", total_factura AS "TOTAL FACTURA", cod_iva1 AS "CÓD. IVA", bien_inversion1 AS "BIEN INVERSIÓN", servicios1 AS "SERVICIOS", base_iva1 AS "BASE IVA", iva_percent1 AS "IVA", iva_tax1 AS "IMPORTE IVA", req_percent1 AS "REQ. EQUIV.", imp_recargo1 AS "IMPORTE REC. EQUIV.", cod_reten1 AS "CÓD. RETENCION", base_retencion1 AS "BASE RETENCIÓN", irpf_percent1 AS "RET", imp_irpf1 AS "IMPORTE RET", cta_contrapartida1 AS "CTA. CONTRAPARTIDA", clave_operacion1 AS "CLAVE OPERACIÓN", det_oper_intracomunitaria1 AS "DET. OPER. INTRACOMUNITARIA", cod_iva2 AS "CÓD. IVA 2", bien_inversion2 AS "BIEN INVERSION 2", servicios2 AS "SERVICIOS 2", base_iva2 AS "BASE IVA 2", iva_percent2 AS "IVA 2", iva_tax2 AS "IMPORTE IVA 2", req_percent2 AS "REQ. EQUIV. 2", imp_recargo2 AS "IMPORTE REC. EQUIV. 2", cod_reten2 AS "CÓD. RETENCIÓN 2", base_retencion2 AS "BASE RETENCION 2", irpf_percent2 AS "RET 2", imp_irpf2 AS "IMPORTE RET 2", cta_contrapartida2 AS "CTA. CONTRAPARTIDA 2", clave_operacion2 AS "CLAVE OPERACIÓN 2", det_oper_intracomunitaria2 AS "DET. OPER. INTRACOMUNITARIA 2", cod_iva3 AS "Cód. IVA 3", bien_inversion3 AS "BIEN INVERSIÓN 3", servicios3 AS "SERVICIOS 3", base_iva3 AS "BASE IVA 3", iva_percent3 AS "IVA 3", iva_tax3 AS "IMPORTE IVA 3", req_percent3 AS "REQ. EQUIV. 3", imp_recargo3 AS "IMPORTE REC. EQUIV. 3", cod_reten3 AS "CÓD. RETENCIÓN 3", base_retencion3 AS "BASE RETENCION 3", irpf_percent3 AS "RET 3", imp_irpf3 AS "IMPORTE RET 3", cta_contrapartida3 AS "CTA. CONTRAPARTIDA 3", clave_operacion3 AS "CLAVE OPERACIÓN 3", det_oper_intracomunitaria3 AS "DET. OPER. INTRACOMUNITARIA 3", total_factura AS "TOTAL FACTURA", pago_automatico AS "PAGO AUTOMÁTICO", operacion_arrendamiento AS "OPERACIÓN ARRENDAMIENTO", concurso_acreedores AS "CONCURSO ACREEDORES", cod_seccion_analitica AS "CÓD. SECCIÓN ANALÍTICA", cod_proyecto_analitica AS "CÓD. PROYECTO ANALÍTICA", ruta_imagen AS "RUTA IMAGEN" from suasor_invoice WHERE fecha_emision >= %(sql_date_compare)s AND tipo_factura IN ('out_invoice','out_refund')

select fecha_emision AS "FECHA EMISIÓN", fecha_operacion AS "FECHA OPERACIÓN", fecha_registro AS "FECHA REGISTRO", tipo_factura AS "TIPO FACTURA", n_documento AS "Nº DOCUMENTO", cuenta AS "CUENTA", nif AS "NIF", nombre AS "NOMBRE", provincia AS "PROVINCIA", pais AS "PAIS", name AS "DESCRIPCIÓN", grupo AS "GRUPO CONTABLE", forma_pago AS "FORMA DE PAGO", terminos_pago AS "TÉRMINOS DE PAGO", omitir_fuera_plazo AS "OMITIR FUERA DE PLAZO", total_factura AS "TOTAL FACTURA", cod_iva1 AS "CÓD. SECCIÓN ANALÍTICA", cod_proyecto_analitica AS "CÓD.
